about_the_game:
A value set of original costumes specially designed to celebrate the 50th Anniversary of TECMO. It includes 35 costumes for 35 characters.

Characters:
- All 35 characters with exception for Mai Shiranui.

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
detailed_description:
A value set of original costumes specially designed to celebrate the 50th Anniversary of TECMO. It includes 35 costumes for 35 characters.

Characters:
- All 35 characters with exception for Mai Shiranui.

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
  • Additional Notes:

oflc.descriptors: Violence, sexualised imagery and nudity, online interactivity

pegi.descriptors: Violence, sexual and online gameplay with other people.

short_description: A value set of original costumes specially designed to celebrate the 50th Anniversary of TECMO. It includes 35 costumes for 35 characters. *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
